metadata.name: Antivirus Relevant File Paths Alerts
metadata.comment: Detects an Antivirus alert in a highly relevant file path or with a relevant file name. This event must not be ignored just because the AV has blocked the malware but investigate, how it came there in the first place.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(file.name), lower(':\\perflogs\\')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower(':\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower(':\\users\\default\\')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower(':\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower(':\\windows\\')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower('/www/')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower('\\inetpub\\')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower('\\tsclient\\')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower('apache')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower('nginx')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower('tomcat')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower('weblogic')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.asax')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.ashx')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.asmx')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.asp')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.aspx')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.bat')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.cfm')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.cgi')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.chm')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.cmd')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.dat')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.ear')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.gif')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.hta')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.jpeg')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.jpg')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.jsp')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.jspx')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.lnk')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.msc')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.php')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.pl')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.png')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.ps1')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.psm1')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.py')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.pyc')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.rb')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.scf')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.sct')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.sh')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.svg')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.txt')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.vbe')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.vbs')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.war')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.wll')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.wsf')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.wsh')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.xll')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.xml')))

output.summary: Detects an Antivirus alert in a highly relevant file path or with a relevant file name. This event must not be ignored just because the AV has blocked the malware but investigate, how it came there in the first place.
